meanings.definition: A group of red and yellow pigments found in plants and fruits.
meanings.sent1: Carotins give carrots their vibrant color.
meanings.sent2: The carotins in pumpkins make them orange.
meanings.sent3: The salad was so colorful, it looked like a rainbow of carotins!
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a burst of carotins, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with hues of carotins.

meanings.definition: Any of several orange or red crystalline hydrocarbon pigments.
meanings.sent1: The carotins in tomatoes make them red and juicy.
meanings.sent2: Oranges get their color from the carotins they contain.
meanings.sent3: The carotins in the candy made it look like tiny jewels.
meanings.sent4: The fire blazed with the intensity of carotins, lighting up the night.
meanings.sent5: The autumn leaves glowed with the colors of carotins.
